title: Welcome to Planner
description: Planner illustrates how a modern logistics platform can streamline delivery operations through intuitive workflows and automated decision-making. This walkthrough highlights the core user journey — from mapping customers to dispatching optimized routes — and demonstrates how Planner reduces operational complexity for end users.

title: Create a Reliable Customer Map
description: Users can add customer locations directly from the map using Ctrl-click — reducing data-entry effort and ensuring geographic accuracy. This design supports fast onboarding of new service areas and gives dispatchers clarity on where demand is coming from.

title: Model Your Fleet with Real Operational Constraints
description: Vehicles can be set up with capacity, cost, and scheduling rules, representing the operational reality of a delivery fleet. Capturing these constraints ensures the optimization engine always generates efficient and feasible routes.

title: Organize Today’s Jobs and Let Automation Assist
description: Dispatchers can assemble the day’s workload and trigger the OR-Tools optimization engine. Planner automates complex routing decisions, helping teams scale operations, reduce manual planning time, and maintain service-level expectations.

title: Optimize Routes for Cost and Service Excellence
description: Planner uses algorithmic intelligence to generate cost-efficient, time-effective routes. The result is improved reliability, lower operational cost, and a workflow that enables teams to focus on execution instead of solving routing puzzles.
